name: Olive Elders - Lost 'N Found
description:
You and your partner run a magical lost and found stores where sorcerers, magicians, and witches come from all places to search for valuable magical items that they have lost (And they do it a lot!). 

Deliver the items correctly to win the game. Better not let those magic people angry, agree?

For this game, two people are required, one to the customer service and another for the stock/inventory.

The Customer Service have to describe the items the clients are requesting, and the inventory have to send the items to the customer service.

Jam Site: 
GGJ'21 by NeCGM

Diversifiers: 
RNG - The notes of the music played are completely randomized
A-Party - To play the game you need a friend and a voice/video call

Platforms: 
Web browser with special plugins or packaged apps

Tools And Technologies: 
Unity (any product)

Credits:
